# AMWorkspace

**Class**

A workspace for running an Automator workflow.

## Declaration

```swift
class AMWorkspace
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.automator/documentation/Automator/AMWorkspace] class provides access to the shared workspace in the Automator framework, where you can run workflows without a workflow controller. Use [doc://com.apple.automator/documentation/Automator/AMWorkspace/shared] to access the shared workspace and [doc://com.apple.automator/documentation/Automator/AMWorkspace/runWorkflow(atPath:withInput:)] to run your workflow in it.

## Accessing the Shared Workspace

- **shared**: The shared workspace object.

## Running Workflows

- **runWorkflow(atPath:withInput:)**: Loads and runs the specified workflow file.

## Workflows

- **AMWorkflow**: An object that lets you use an Automator workflow in your app.
- **AMWorkflowController**: An object that lets you manage an Automator workflow in your app.
- **AMWorkflowView**: An object that lets you view and edit Automator workflows in your app.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
